channel.title: Make bows act like bows
channel.description: I have a 317 server, and it has some customs. Now I know most of you want to run because you saw the word customs, but hear me out. i have a couple customs bows, and a couple customs c'bows. How do i make them actually range instead of just melee?

item.title: Make bows act like bows
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Nerdaz:

Still can’t figure it out, can someone be more discriptive.

public final int[] OTHER_RANGE_WEAPONS = {863,864,865,866,867,868,869,806,807,808,809,810,811,825,826,827,828,829,830,800,801,802,803,804,805,6522,13879,15016}; public final int[] BOWS = {15241, 9185,839,845,847,851,855,859,841,843,849,853,857,861,4212,4214,4215,11235,4216,4217,4218,4219,4220,4221,4222,4223,6724,4734,4934,4935,4936,4937}; public final int[] ARROWS = {15243, 882,884,886,888,890,892,4740,11212,9140,9141,4142,9143,9144,9240,9241,9242,9243,9244,9245}; public final int[] NO_ARROW_DROP = {15243, 4212,4214,4215,4216,4217,4218,4219,4220,4221,4222,4223,4734,4934,4935,4936,4937}; public static final int[] Bolts = { 877, 4740, 9139, 9140, 9141, 9142, 9143, 9144, 9145, 9236, 9237, 9238, 9239, 9240, 9241, 9242, 9243, 9244, 9245};

-exaggerated gasp-

ily
